overview: The Honeymoon, which is the second part of the operetta series. It was presented in 1978 and it is the most beautiful part in terms of the development of the story and the multiplicity of melodies, this part continued to star in the duo Abdul Hussein Abdul Redha and Suad Abdullah, but it was directed by the great director Faisal Al-Dahi, the husband of the great artist Suad Abdullah, also this part has achieved a great month and may be the part The most famous of this operetta series.
title: The Honeymoon
